alert.note: Alert for Fountain; Montgomery; Parke; Tippecanoe; Vermillion; Warren (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 7:06AM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Fountain, southwestern Tippecanoe, northwestern Parke, Warren, northwestern Vermillion and Montgomery Counties through 745 AM EDT... At 706 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Cissna Park to 7 miles south of Covington. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Covington around 710 AM EDT. Veedersburg around 715 AM EDT. Williamsport around 725 AM EDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Crawfordsville. This includes Interstate 74 between mile markers 1 and 38. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Fountain; Montgomery; Parke; Tippecanoe; Vermillion; Warren
